<<<<<<< HEAD
The signs of the times forerunning the kingdom of Christ, and evidencing when it is come by J. Lead. Lead, Jane, 1623-1704. Loutherbourg, Philippe-Jacques de, 1740-1812.
[12], 19, [1] p.
[s.n.], London : Printed in the Year, 1699.
Advertisement: "Books Written by the Author", p. [1] at end. Imperfect: cropped, with loss of text. "P. Loutherbourg. 1796" printed or stamped on fly-leaf and on t.p. below imprint. Philippe-Jacques de Loutherbourg, 1740-1812 (cf. DNB, LCNAF), was an artist active in France and England 18th/19th cent. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
